Package gamelogic

Class Quiz

  • java.lang.Object
    • gamelogic.Quiz
  • public class Quiz
extends java.lang.Object
    The Quiz-class is used to create quizzes. A Quiz has a question, an array of alternatives, a correct answer, a transaction and an array of outcomes.

      private boolean isCorrect​(java.lang.String answer)  
      java.lang.String validateAnswer​(Player player, java.lang.String answer)
      This method is used to validate if a players answer is correct or not, and then make a transaction based on this.

      • validateAnswer

        public java.lang.String validateAnswer​(Player player,
                                       java.lang.String answer)
        This method is used to validate if a players answer is correct or not, and then make a transaction based on this.
        Parameters:
        player - This is the player giving an answer to the quiz
        answer - The players answer
        Returns:
        This will return an outcome depending on the players answer
